sentences.en: After two days of wildflower rockeries, we left.
sentences.cn: 我们在野花丛生的美丽岩畔徒步行走了两天过后, 便离开了这个地方.

sentences.en: And yes, if I see the blue flowers again, you can bet I'll stop and transplant them to my wildflower garden.
sentences.cn: 是的，如果我再次看到那些蓝色的花儿，你可以相信，我会停下来把它们移植到我的野花花园里。

sentences.en: And yes,if I see the blue flowers again,you can bet I'll stop and transplant them to my wildflower garden.
sentences.cn: 是的，如果我再次看到那些蓝色的花儿，你可以相信，我会停下来把它们移值到我的野花花园里。

sentences.en: Even Packard admitted to himself that the unusual wildflower must have been a fluke, or misidentified.
sentences.cn: 帕克德甚至告诉自己那不同寻常的野花一定是偶然出现的, 或被认错了.

sentences.en: From wildflower meadows to redwood forests to alpine bogs, the diversity of seed plants rings out as one of evolution's great achievements.
sentences.cn: 从野花遍布的草地到红杉森林，再到阿尔卑斯的沼泽地，种子植物多样性的耀眼成就吹响了植物进化的号角。

sentences.en: This spring, I started a wildflower garden in our yard.
sentences.cn: 今年春天, 我在自家院子里开辟了一片野花花园.

sentences.en: This spring, I started wildflower garden in our yard.
sentences.cn: 二零零九年春天, 我在自家院子里开辟了一片野花花园.

sentences.en: Within weeks, showy evening primroses spread their petals, joining a wildflower pageant 650 species strong.
sentences.cn: 只有几个星期, 报春花在美丽的傍晚展开它的花瓣, 与其他650多种野花一起绽放.

trans.tran_en: Wildflowers are flowers that grow naturally in the countryside, rather than being grown by people in gardens
